title: Comparative performance of liquid chromatography and spectrophotometry in determining metformin hydrochloride within pharmaceutical formulations
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Amani Kurdi, Waleed Alhussaini, Abdulrahman Alawaji, Abdullah Alhudathi, Rakan Alharbi, Faisal Binsaleh, Yazeed Alghamidi, Abdulkareem Al Bekairy, Abdulmalik Alkatheri, Imadul Islam, Ibrahim Farh, Ezzeldeen Ghanem, Mahmoud Mansour
